name: Facebook - RTL to  Hebrew & Arabic Text
description:
This style is for users who choose the ENGLISH interface but want all Hebrew/Arabic text to be aligned to the right.

הסקריפט מצמיד לימין טקסט בעברית וערבית בפייסבוק

See how it fixes this post for example:
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10153360425364757&set=a.10150432853484757.383237.847129756&type=1

Try also my style 63176. I think it looks better.
